title: Shanghai test vectors
body:
- [ ] check that Shanghai block rejected before transition
- [ ] check that Merge block rejected after transition
- [ ] check that Block without withdrawals root header field but with withdrawals in the body gets rejected after transition
- [ ] check that if withdrawals root does not match the withdrawals body block rejected
- [ ] check that Shanghai block without withdrawals rlp body is rejected as incomplete
- [ ] check what happens if withdrawals RLP body fields are in wrong order
- [ ] check if withdrawals rlp body is not presented as List

Withdrawals
```
      "index": "0x00",
      "validatorIndex", "0x00",
      "address": "0xabc...",
      "amount": "0x00...",
```
- [ ] what a the ranges of this fields. check the bounds
- [ ] what if there are two identical indexes in the block withdrawals list of items
- [ ] what if there are two identical validator indexes ? 
- [ ] can two different withdrawals happen to the same address? (equal or different validator index)
- [ ] withdrawal with 0x00 amouont. does not change anything?
- [ ] what if the fields in rlp comes mixed, wrong order? there order must be verified. 
- [ ] what if withdrawl happen to address, but in the same block smth happen to this addresss
1) it suicide 2) it gets fund from another transaction 3) it sends fund 4) it is being created or reverted

check that eth_getBlockBy  rpc requests report withdrawals in the block if they should
